channel.title: Virent #838
channel.description:
[LEFT] [center][img]http://www.virentps.com/img/virent-temp-logo.png[/img][/center]
Well the whole point in this is to bring a fun rs3 server like there were back in rs2 days, Yes RS3 "MoparScape" type Server. First off if you want to sit and bash this just leave, Just something I want to work on my break from school completed my 2nd year at itt-tech. I use to play these types of servers all the time until the "Remake" phase came.Then they died off and everyone just remakes RS now where's the fun and unique servers at why do you all copy each other and make every server a remake or shitty EXP rates to the point no one plays.
Base: Matrix 838 by Trent
[U][SIZE=5]Team[/SIZE][/U] Me The Original
[U][SIZE=5]Server Goals[/SIZE][/U]
[ul][*]838 Client & Cache loading 838 for now [*]Every Packet Documented [*]Old MoparScape RSPS Feeling [*]Legacy & EoC Modes [*]Eventually Upgraded Combat[/ul]
[SIZE=5][U]Updates[/U][/SIZE] [ul][*]7/27/15 - 838 Started with Trents release, removing a lot of shit I wont use, donations, highscores ect. [*]7/27/15 - Found Kyle's/Seans and myself old 838, this way if Trent missed anything there's a pretty good chance Kyle or myself got it. [*]7/27/15 - Removed all Content(Skills. Minigames, Dialogue's) Source is now as bare as [URL=http://"https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=656244.0"]this[/URL] [*]7/28/15 - Cleaned and rewrote the How Interfaces are used. [*]7/28/15 - Removed the action system and now using ScapeEmu's [*]7/28/15 - Started some combat calculations and bonuses [*]7/28/15 - Cleared out all the handlers (Objects, Inventory, NPCs, Buttons) [*]7/28/15 - Started adding in a lot of updated buttons witch are handled by each interface in python, [*]7/30/15 - Removed all content as of now (skills, controlers cutscenes) [*]7/31/15 - Kyle update the netty to 4.0.30[/ul]
[SIZE=5][U]Media[/U][CENTER] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9FVTVwD.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JHTCryt.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9K8kZs5.png[/img][/CENTER] [/size]
[SIZE=5][U]Credits[/U]
[ul][*]Makar [*]DragonKK [*]TitianPK [*]Matrix Team [*]Kyle[/ul]
[/LEFT]

item.title: Virent #838
item.dc:creator: @Sir_James1996 Sir James1996
item.description:
@Sir_James1996 wrote:

[LEFT]
[center][/center]

Well the whole point in this is to bring a fun rs3 server like there were back in rs2 days, Yes RS3 “MoparScape” type Server. First off if you want to sit and bash this just leave, Just something I want to work on my break from school completed my 2nd year at itt-tech. I use to play these types of servers all the time until the “Remake” phase came.Then they died off and everyone just remakes RS now where’s the fun and unique servers at why do you all copy each other and make every server a remake or shitty EXP rates to the point no one plays.

Base: Matrix 838 by Trent

[SIZE=5]Team[/SIZE]
Me
The Original

[SIZE=5]Server Goals[/SIZE]

[ul][]838 Client & Cache loading 838 for now
[]Every Packet Documented
[]Old MoparScape RSPS Feeling
[]Legacy & EoC Modes
[*]Eventually Upgraded Combat[/ul]

[SIZE=5]Updates[/SIZE]
[ul][]7/27/15 - 838 Started with Trents release, removing a lot of shit I wont use, donations, highscores ect.
[]7/27/15 - Found Kyle’s/Seans and myself old 838, this way if Trent missed anything there’s a pretty good chance Kyle or myself got it.
[]7/27/15 - Removed all Content(Skills. Minigames, Dialogue’s) Source is now as bare as this
[]7/28/15 - Cleaned and rewrote the How Interfaces are used.
[]7/28/15 - Removed the action system and now using ScapeEmu’s
[]7/28/15 - Started some combat calculations and bonuses
[]7/28/15 - Cleared out all the handlers (Objects, Inventory, NPCs, Buttons)
[]7/28/15 - Started adding in a lot of updated buttons witch are handled by each interface in python,
[]7/30/15 - Removed all content as of now (skills, controlers cutscenes)
[]7/31/15 - Kyle update the netty to 4.0.30[/ul]
